a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Reduction in income inequality before and after tax
Percentage reduction in the Gini coefficient of income when measured after taxes and benefits, as compared to before
Data source: OECD Income Distribution Database (2023)
Note: Reductions relate to percent, not percentage points i.e., a reduction in the Gini from 0.4 to 0.3 gives a value of 25%. Income has been
